member.name: T:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.CodeGenerationAttributeAttribute
member.summary: A base attribute type for code generation attributes.

member.name: M:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.CodeGenerationAttributeAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The fully-qualified type name (including assembly information) of the code generator to activate. This type must implement ICodeGenerator.

member.name: M:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.CodeGenerationAttributeAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The code generator that implements ICodeGenerator.

member.name: P:CodeGeneration.Roslyn.CodeGenerationAttributeAttribute.GeneratorFullTypeName
member.summary: Gets the fully-qualified type name (including assembly information) of the code generator to activate.
